description: "'Monumentum' has in view to express the purpose of ICOMOS and the ideals inspiring it. It presents itslef as the instrument to voice our aims and programmes and, at the same time, it may lead to a better understanding both of the universal value reprensented by the patrimony of the monuments and of the culture reflected in this patrimony." Piero Gazzola, Preseident of ICOMOS,1967 Index (by author / par auteur)Vol. I, 1967Vol. II, 1968Vol. III, 1969Vol. IV, 1969Vol. V, 1970Vol. VI, 1971Vol. VII, 1971Vol. VIII, 1972Vol. IX, 1973Vol. X, 1973Vol. XI-XII, 1975Vol. XIII, 1976Vol. XIV, 1976Vol. XV-XVI, 1977Vol. XVII, 1978Vol. XVIII-XIX, 1979Vol. XX-XXI-XXII, 1982Vol. XXIII-XXIV, 1981Vol. 25,1, 1982Vol. 25,2, 1982Vol. 25,3, 1982Vol. 25,4, 1982Vol. 26,1, 1983Vol. 26,2, 1983Vol. 26,3, 1983Vol. 26,4, 1983Vol. 27,1, 1984Vol. 27,2, 1984Vol. 27,3, 1984Vol. 27,4, 1984Special issue, 1984
